Row.Text: City is considered [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] [COLOR_JFD_UNHAPPINESS]Unhappy[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]City will enter [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance in {1_Num} Turn(s)![ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness is used to offset [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness produced by cities and [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizens. Local Happiness cannot exceed the number of [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizens in the city.[NEWLINE]{1_HappinessSources}[NEWLINE]----------------[NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{2_HappinessTotal} [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness Total[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness is used to offset [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness, excess of which contributes toward potential [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance. The threshold at which Resistance strikes is increased with your Total Happiness. Excess Happiness is converted directly into [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production.[NEWLINE]{1_UnhappinessBreakdown}[NEWLINE]{3_HappinessBreakdown}[NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]{2_Num} [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Total[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{4_Num} [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Total[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{8_HL}[ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance Sentiment: {5_Num}/{6_Num}[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{8_HL}City will enter [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance in {7_Num} Turn(s)[ENDCOLOR]
Citizens in {1_CityName} are staging protests against our rule because their [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness remains too high!
Citizens are planning to stage protests in {1_CityName} in {2_Num} turns if we do not address their [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness!
Unhappy Citizens are staging widespread protests in the {1_CivName}.
